mapper.select: SELECT review_num, i.item_name, c.cust_name, review_title, review_date, review_content, review_img FROM review r, item i, customer c WHERE r.item_num = i.item_num AND r.cust_num = c.cust_num ORDER BY review_num DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT r.review_num, i.item_name, c.cust_name, c.cust_num, r.review_title, r.review_date, r.review_content, r.review_img FROM review r, item i, customer c WHERE review_num = #{reviewNum} AND r.item_num = i.item_num AND r.cust_num = c.cust_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(review_title, order_detail_num, review_content, review_img, item_num, cust_num) VALUES(#{reviewTitle}, #{orderDetailNum}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewImg}, #{itemNum}, #{custNum})
